means: <正>使大大的减少，使空虚( deplete的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Both teams were severely depleted by injuries.
sentence.Network_cn: 两个队都因队员受伤而实力大减.

sentence.Network_en: Our supplies of food are rather depleted.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的食品供应大大地减少了.

微电子学英语_百度百科 ... Depletion effect 耗尽效应 Depletion layer 耗尽层（depletion layer） Depletion region 耗尽区.

entry.def: To deplete a stock or amount of something means to reduce it.

example.tran: 大量消耗臭氧层的物质

example.ex: They fired in long bursts, which depleted their ammunition...
example.tran: 他们长时间开火，耗尽了弹药。

auth_sentence.content: Fossil fuels are finite, and rapidly being depleted.
auth_sentence.res_content: Fossil fuels are finite, and rapidly being depleted.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fossil fuels are finite, and rapidly being depleted.

auth_sentence.content: But it has also depleted its supply of sand.
auth_sentence.res_content: But it has also depleted its supply of sand.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But it has also depleted its supply of sand.

auth_sentence.content: Depleted land and water can't be restored artificially.
auth_sentence.res_content: Depleted land and water can't be restored artificially.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Depleted land and water can't be restored artificially.
